title: Values, I’ll Show You Values…How Much Will Pay Me to Set Aside My Values?
description:
Values matter.  Well, at least the appearance of having values matter.  Well, at least they always did until Donald Trump came along.  Now, around the world foreign leaders know that the US is in it for whatever Donald Trump thinks is best for Donald Trump.  Our panel of Kori Schake, Kelly Magsamen and Max Boot discuss what that means from North Korea to China, from attacks on members of the press to climate change.  Tune in for a great discussion.Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

content:encoded:
Values matter. Well, at least the appearance of having values matter. Well, at least they always did until Donald Trump came along. Now, around the world foreign leaders know that the US is in it for whatever Donald Trump thinks is best for Donald Trump. Our panel of Kori Schake, Kelly Magsamen and Max Boot discuss what that means from North Korea to China, from attacks on members of the press to climate change. Tune in for a great discussion.
